page.title: 16HOUSING TYPES in Alvaston
page.content:
We went to look at the streets in Alvaston.We saw different kinds of houses.We saw{bungalows.}They have no upstairs.Most bungalows were for old people.
We saw{semi-detatched}houses,two houses joined together.We saw{detached houses.These stand on their own.We saw {terraced}houses.These are rows of houses joined together.
Most of the houses we saw were semi- detached.Many are around{50 years 0ld} but there were newer ones.The terraced houses we saw were about{100 years old.They are{Victorian}terraces.
There is a mixture of{owner occupied and{Local Authority}owned houses in the area.
